name: Errands '99
description:
There's a note on the kitchen table! Your neighbor called earlier, but you were asleep. Maybe if you read the note you can find out what they wanted?

Errands '99 is a love letter to my childhood spent on my Gameboy Color. Developed in GB Studio during TOJam 2020.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrows - Move
Z - Interact
X - Cancel
ENTER - Menu
